verses.verse: וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> made בְּצַלְאֵ֛ל <WH1212> And Bezaleel אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> the ark עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֨יִם <WH520> two cubits וָחֵ֜צִי <WH2677> and a half אָרְכּ֗וֹ <WH753> [was] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <WH520> of it and a cubit וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <WH2677> and a half רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> of it and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> the height

וַיְצַפֵּ֛הוּ <WH6823> And he overlaid זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> it with pure מִבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> within וּמִח֑וּץ <WH2351> and without וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and made ל֛וֹ זֵ֥ר <WH2213> a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> to it round about

וַיִּצֹ֣ק <WH3332> And he cast ל֗וֹ אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> for it four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold עַ֖ל <WH5921> and אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> [to be set] by the four פַּעֲמֹתָ֑יו <WH6471> corners וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> of it even two טַבָּעֹ֗ת <WH2885> rings עַל־ <WH5921> and צַלְעוֹ֙ <WH6763> side הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> upon the one וּשְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> of it and two טַבָּע֔וֹת <WH2885> rings עַל־ <WH5921> and צַלְע֖וֹ <WH6763> side הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> upon the other
וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made בַּדֵּ֖י <WH905> staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> them with gold

וַיָּבֵ֤א <WH935> And he put אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH905> the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> into the rings עַ֖ל <WH5921> on צַלְעֹ֣ת <WH6763> by the sides הָאָרֹ֑ן <WH727> of the ark לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> to bear אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֹֽן׃ <WH727> the ark

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made כַּפֹּ֖רֶת <WH3727> the mercy seat זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> [of] pure אַמָּתַ֤יִם <WH520> two cubits וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <WH2677> and a half אָרְכָּ֔הּ <WH753> [was] the length וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> thereof and one cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> and a half רָחְבָּֽהּ׃ <WH7341> the breadth

וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> two כְרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> cherubims זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> [of] gold מִקְשָׁה֙ <WH4749> beaten out of one piece עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> made אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> מִשְּׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> he them on the two קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> ends הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <WH3727> of the mercy seat

כְּרוּב־ <WH3742> cherub אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> One מִקָּצָה֙ <WH7098> on the end מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> the one וּכְרוּב־ <WH3742> cherub אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> on this side and another מִקָּצָ֖ה <WH7098> on the [other] end מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> the other מִן־ <WH4480> with הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> on that side out of the mercy seat עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> made אֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> he the cherubims מִשְּׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> on the two [קִצְוֹותֹו כ] (קְצֹותָֽיו׃ <WH7118> end ק)

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> had הַכְּרֻבִים֩ <WH3742> And the cherubims פֹּרְשֵׂ֨י <WH6566> spread out כְנָפַ֜יִם <WH3671> [their] wings לְמַ֗עְלָה <WH4605> on high סֹֽכְכִ֤ים <WH5526> [and] covered בְּכַנְפֵיהֶם֙ <WH3671> with their wings עַל־ <WH5921> and הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <WH3727> over the mercy seat וּפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> with their faces אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> toward אָחִ֑יו <WH251> to another אֶל־ <WH413> were toward הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <WH3727> [even] to the mercy seatward הָי֖וּ <WH1961> had פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> were the faces הַכְּרֻבִֽים׃ <WH3742> of the cherubims פ

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָ֖ן <WH7979> the table עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֤יִם <WH520> two cubits אָרְכּוֹ֙ <WH753> [was] the length וְאַמָּ֣ה <WH520> thereof and a cubit רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> the height

וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> And he overlaid אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> it with pure וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and made ל֛וֹ זֵ֥ר <WH2213> thereunto a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> Also he made ל֥וֹ מִסְגֶּ֛רֶת <WH4526> thereunto a border טֹ֖פַח <WH2948> of an handbreadth סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> and made זֵר־ <WH2213> a crown זָהָ֛ב <WH2091> of gold לְמִסְגַּרְתּ֖וֹ <WH4526> for the border סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> thereof round about

וַיִּצֹ֣ק <WH3332> And he cast ל֔וֹ אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> for it four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> of gold וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and put אֶת־ <WH853> הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> the rings עַ֚ל <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> upon the four הַפֵּאֹ֔ת <WH6285> corners אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> were לְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> that [were] in the four רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> feet

לְעֻמַּת֙ <WH5980> Over against הַמִּסְגֶּ֔רֶת <WH4526> the border הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <WH2885> were the rings בָּתִּים֙ <WH1004> the places לַבַּדִּ֔ים <WH905> for the staves לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> to bear אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃ <WH7979> the table

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH905> the staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֔ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> them with gold לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> to bear אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃ <WH7979> the table

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַכֵּלִ֣ים ׀ <WH3627> the vessels אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> were on הַשֻּׁלְחָ֗ן <WH7979> which [were] upon the table אֶת־ <WH853> קְעָרֹתָ֤יו <WH7086> his dishes וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּפֹּתָיו֙ <WH3709> and his spoons וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מְנַקִּיֹּתָ֔יו <WH4518> and his bowls וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַקְּשָׂוֹ֔ת <WH7184> and his covers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יֻסַּ֖ךְ <WH5258> to cover בָּהֵ֑ן <WH2004> withal זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> [of] pure פ

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנֹרָ֖ה <WH4501> the candlestick זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> [of] pure מִקְשָׁ֞ה <WH4749> [of] beaten work עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> made אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <WH4501> he the candlestick יְרֵכָ֣הּ <WH3409> his shaft וְקָנָ֔הּ <WH7070> and his branch גְּבִיעֶ֛יהָ <WH1375> his bowls כַּפְתֹּרֶ֥יהָ <WH3730> his knops וּפְרָחֶ֖יהָ <WH6525> and his flowers מִמֶּ֥נָּה <WH4480> at הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> And six קָנִ֔ים <WH7070> branches יֹצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> going out מִצִּדֶּ֑יהָ <WH6654> of the sides שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה ׀ <WH7969> thereof three קְנֵ֣י <WH7070> branches מְנֹרָ֗ה <WH4501> of the candlestick מִצִּדָּהּ֙ <WH6654> side הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> out of the one וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> thereof and three קְנֵ֣י <WH7070> branches מְנֹרָ֔ה <WH4501> of the candlestick מִצִּדָּ֖הּ <WH6654> side הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> out of the other

שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> Three גְ֠בִעִים <WH1375> bowls מְֽשֻׁקָּדִ֞ים <WH8246> made after the fashion of almonds בַּקָּנֶ֣ה <WH7070> branch הָאֶחָד֮ <WH259> in one כַּפְתֹּ֣ר <WH3730> a knop וָפֶרַח֒ <WH6525> and a flower וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> and three גְבִעִ֗ים <WH1375> bowls מְשֻׁקָּדִ֛ים <WH8246> made like almonds בְּקָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> branch אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> in another כַּפְתֹּ֣ר <WH3730> a knop וָפָ֑רַח <WH6525> and a flower כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> for לְשֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> so throughout the six הַקָּנִ֔ים <WH7070> branches הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> going out מִן־ <WH4480> out הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃ <WH4501> of the candlestick

וּבַמְּנֹרָ֖ה <WH4501> And in the candlestick אַרְבָּעָ֣ה <WH702> [were] four גְבִעִ֑ים <WH1375> bowls מְשֻׁ֨קָּדִ֔ים <WH8246> made like almonds כַּפְתֹּרֶ֖יהָ <WH3730> his knops וּפְרָחֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6525> and his flowers

וְכַפְתֹּ֡ר <WH3730> And a knop תַּחַת֩ <WH8478> was under שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> under two הַקָּנִ֜ים <WH7070> branches מִמֶּ֗נָּה <WH4480> and a וְכַפְתֹּר֙ <WH3730> of the same and a knop תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> under two הַקָּנִים֙ <WH7070> branches מִמֶּ֔נָּה <WH4480> and a וְכַפְתֹּ֕ר <WH3730> of the same and a knop תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> under two הַקָּנִ֖ים <WH7070> branches מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> for לְשֵׁ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH8337> of the same according to the six הַקָּנִ֔ים <WH7070> branches הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> going out מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> at

כַּפְתֹּרֵיהֶ֥ם <WH3730> Their knops וּקְנֹתָ֖ם <WH7070> and their branches מִמֶּ֣נָּה <WH4480> at הָי֑וּ <WH1961> become כֻּלָּ֛הּ <WH3605> the whole מִקְשָׁ֥ה <WH4749> beaten work אַחַ֖ת <WH259> were of the same all of it [was] one זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> [of] pure

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> נֵרֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH5216> lamps שִׁבְעָ֑ה <WH7651> his seven וּמַלְקָחֶ֥יהָ <WH4457> and his snuffers וּמַחְתֹּתֶ֖יהָ <WH4289> and his snuffdishes זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> [of] pure

כִּכָּ֛ר <WH3603> [Of] a talent זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> of pure עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> made אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3627> he it and all the vessels פ

וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> altar הַקְּטֹ֖רֶת <WH7004> the incense עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim אַמָּ֣ה <WH520> of it [was] a cubit אָרְכּוֹ֩ <WH753> the length וְאַמָּ֨ה <WH520> of it a cubit רָחְבּ֜וֹ <WH7341> and the breadth רָב֗וּעַ <WH7251> [it was] foursquare וְאַמָּתַ֙יִם֙ <WH520> and two cubits קֹֽמָת֔וֹ <WH6967> [was] the height מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become קַרְנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH7161> of it the horns

וַיְצַ֨ף <WH6823> And he overlaid אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֗וֹר <WH2889> it with pure אֶת־ <WH853> גַּגּ֧וֹ <WH1406> [both] the top וְאֶת־ <WH853> קִירֹתָ֛יו <WH7023> of it and the sides סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> thereof round about וְאֶת־ <WH853> קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <WH7161> and the horns וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> of it also he made ל֛וֹ זֵ֥ר <WH2213> unto it a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וּשְׁתֵּי֩ <WH8147> two טַבְּעֹ֨ת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֜ב <WH2091> of gold עָֽשָׂה־ <WH6213> And he made ל֣וֹ ׀ מִתַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under לְזֵר֗וֹ <WH2213> for it under the crown עַ֚ל <WH5921> on שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> thereof by the two צַלְעֹתָ֔יו <WH6763> corners עַ֖ל <WH5921> and שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> of it upon the two צִדָּ֑יו <WH6654> sides לְבָתִּ֣ים <WH1004> thereof to be places לְבַדִּ֔ים <WH905> for the staves לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> to bear אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּ֖ים <WH905> the staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> them with gold

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <WH6213> And he made אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָה֙ <WH4888> anointing קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy וְאֶת־ <WH853> קְטֹ֥רֶת <WH7004> incense הַסַּמִּ֖ים <WH5561> of sweet spices טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> and the pure מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> according to the work רֹקֵֽחַ׃ <WH7543> of the apothecary פ
